title: This years ultimate rarity skin
body: i wonder what the progress of this years ultimate skin is at or even if they are making an ultimate skin for this year. I have forgotten when the mf came out last year but i thought we would be getting some teasers for it around now or soon

replies.body:
The stopped doing them every year after Sona (or was it Lux?). The work and conception that goes into Ultimate skins is massive, and no-one wants to get the rushed ultimate skin for their favourite champion. Since the quality and depth of Ultimate skins went up, Riot basically said "we're going to take the time to do these right, instead of getting as many out as possible."

We are getting epic and legendary skins at a much higher frequency (and for the most part quality) than we used to now as well, so really it's wins all around. As cool as ultimate skins are, personally I'd rather the time is spent to make them truly awesome.
